navbar.metamaskNotFound: MetaMask not found! Please install the MetaMask extension.

hero.title: Digital Identity
hero.subtitle: PetID is a decentralized platform that creates unique and secure digital identities for pets using blockchain

secure.title: Secure & Immutable
secure.description: Records protected by blockchain, impossible to falsify

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.description: No dependence on central authorities or governments

uniqueId.title: Unique ID
uniqueId.description: Each pet receives a unique and verifiable digital identity

features.title: Revolutionary Features
features.subtitle: Discover how PetID is transforming the way we care for and protect our pets

blockchainRegistry.title: Blockchain Registry
blockchainRegistry.description: Each pet receives an immutable record on the blockchain, ensuring authenticity and data security.

qrCode.title: Unique QR Code
qrCode.description: Generate unique QR codes for your pets, facilitating quick identification in case of loss.

globalNetwork.title: Global Network
globalNetwork.description: Access pet information anywhere in the world through the decentralized network.

medicalHistory.title: Medical History
medicalHistory.description: Keep a complete and secure record of your pets' medical history and vaccinations.

smartSearch.title: Smart Search
smartSearch.description: Advanced search system to locate lost pets using AI and machine learning.

nftPets.title: NFT Pets
nftPets.description: Transform your pet's identity into a unique and collectible NFT on the blockchain.

cta.title: Ready to protect your pet?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of pet owners who already trust blockchain technology to keep their animals safe and protected.

petRegistration.title: Register Your Pet
petRegistration.subtitle: Create a permanent digital identity for your pet on the blockchain

warnings.demoVersion: This is a demo version. The contract has not been deployed yet.

nftImport.title: Import this NFT to your wallet:
nftImport.instructions: In MetaMask, go to NFTs > Import NFT and fill in the fields above.

notConnected.title: Connect Your Wallet
notConnected.description: To register a pet, you need to connect your MetaMask wallet first.

walletConnect.title: Connect Your Wallet
walletConnect.subtitle: Connect your MetaMask wallet to start using PetID

about.title: About Pet ID
about.description: Pet ID is a decentralized platform for pet data identification and management on the blockchain. Connect your wallet to register, transfer and manage digital pet identities.

messages.metamaskNotFound: MetaMask not found! Please install the extension.

myPetNFTs.title: My Pet NFTs
myPetNFTs.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to view your NFTs.

footer.description: Creating secure digital identities for pets using blockchain technology.
